item.title: 迁移到Hugo模块
item.description: https://t.is-local.org/zh-cn/docs/updating/convert-site-to-module/ ​ 将现有站点转换为使用Docsy作为Hugo模块 适用于急于求成的专家 ​ 从命令行运行以下命令： CLI: === “Unix shell” ```bash cd /path/to/my-existing-site hugo mod init github.com/me-at-github/my-existing-site hugo mod get github.com/google/docsy@v0.6.0 sed -i '/theme = \["docsy"\]/d' config.toml cat >>
